title: Bug found
body:
I have had my league like this, it will not allow me to look down with camera and i cannot access shop without going to the actual person, what is happening?[]
(http://imgur.com/NP7tU4A

replies.body:
Hey there,

Not sure what you're trying to show here, all I see from that screenshot is the loading screen and your game running in windowed mode?

Could you perhaps offer a better description of your issue?

Ok

So i was playing league, and started to type
my window then had a crash, and came back to this
This window restricts me to see how much gold i have, what abilities i can use and i am not able to look down using free camera (if i do not click on where i want to see)

I still don't understand. All your image shows is the loading screen in windowed mode?

Is your issue the fact that the game is in windowed mode? You can change this in the game settings (while in game press escape)
